Package org.douggschwind.games.cardgames.wildcardpoker

Class WildCardGame

java.lang.Object
org.douggschwind.games.cardgames.common.StandardDeckCardGame
org.douggschwind.games.cardgames.wildcardpoker.WildCardGame
Direct Known Subclasses:
DeucesWild, OneEyedJacksWild
public abstract class WildCardGame extends StandardDeckCardGame
This is a 5 card draw poker game where all four deuces in the deck are each considered a wild card.
